attributes.action: Rescind the Repeal of Section 75 of the Local Government & Provisions Act (1975)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is asked that the Repeal of the Local Government & Provisions Act (1975)either be rescinded in full or its implementation delayed until such time as a workable alternative is found and put in place.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Rescind the Repeal of Section 75 of the Local Government & Provisions Act (1975)."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13881.asp

Prime Minister's Office
